long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
XML Sitemap Crawler Chrome Extension (Meta Robot & Robots.txt)

This Chrome extension helps SEO experts check the meta robot and robots.txt status of URLs directly from XML sitemaps. It's a valuable SEO tool for identifying issues such as deindex, disallow by robots.txt, no meta robot, etc, allowing developers to quickly spot and fix the problems.

The XML Sitemap extension also allows you to download the data as a CSV file, making it easy to keep a record for future reference.

If the extension isn't working, please refresh the webpage and try it again. We hope you find this SEO extension helpful! Thank you very much!
